| History                 = The Dogs of Hell were a biker gang with many chapters scattered throughout the [[United States of America|United States]].{{r|Immortal Hulk Vol 1 1}} The [[Wilson Fisk (Earth-616)|Kingpin]] introduced [[Janus Jardeesh (Earth-616)|Janus Jardeesh]] to the Dogs of Hell while grooming the newly empowered [[Terrigenesis#Humans|Nuhuman]] to serve as one of his lieutenants.{{r|Civil War II: Kingpin Vol 1 2}}

In [[Arizona (State)|Arizona]], the loan sharking of a faction of the Dogs of Hell led [[Thomas Hill (Earth-616)|Tommy Hill]] to rob a gas station, which resulted in the death of three people, including [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Bruce Banner]]. When Banner returned to life as the Hulk the following night, he tracked Tommy to the Dogs of Hell's hangout spot, and took them down before beating Tommy within an inch of his life.{{r|Immortal Hulk Vol 1 1}}
